l:dependency.name: Jackson-annotations
l:dependency.l:description: Core annotations used for value types, used by Jackson data binding package.

l:license.name: GNU Lesser General Public License, Version 2.1

l:dependency.name: JUnit
l:dependency.l:description: JUnit is a regression testing framework written by Erich Gamma and Kent Beck. It is used by the developer who implements unit tests in Java.

l:dependency.name: Commons Logging
l:dependency.l:description: Commons Logging is a thin adapter allowing configurable bridging to other, well known logging systems.

l:dependency.name: jackson-databind
l:dependency.l:description: General data-binding functionality for Jackson: works on core streaming API

l:license.name: GNU Lesser General Public License, Version 2.1

l:dependency.name: Hamcrest Core
l:dependency.l:description: This is the core API of hamcrest matcher framework to be used by third-party framework providers. This includes the a foundation set of matcher implementations for common operations.

l:dependency.name: Jackson-core
l:dependency.l:description: Core Jackson abstractions, basic JSON streaming API implementation

l:license.name: GNU Lesser General Public License, Version 2.1

l:dependency.name: Commons Codec
l:dependency.l:description: The codec package contains simple encoder and decoders for various formats such as Base64 and Hexadecimal. In addition to these widely used encoders and decoders, the codec package also maintains a collection of phonetic encoding utilities.
